action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1001 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 42. Record Vote Number: 236.
Amendment SA 1001 proposed by Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S8386-8390, S8392-8393, S8403-8404; text: CR S8387) To eliminate the coverage gap.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1001 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 42. Record Vote Number: 236.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1001 proposed by Senator Boxer.
